sentences.sContent: the rough draft of his new novel
I read the first draft and thought it was very good.
sentences.sCn: 我读了第一稿，觉得非常好。

sentences.sContent: All parties eventually approved the final draft (= finished form ) of the peace treaty.
sentences.sCn: 各方最后都同意了和平条约的终稿。

phrases.pCn: 抽风机；通风机；通气风扇
(啤酒)散装的，可从容器中随时直接汲出的

trans.tranCn: 汇票；草稿；选派；（尤指房间、烟囱、炉子等供暖系统中的）（小股）气流
trans.tranOther: a piece of writing or a plan that is not yet in its finished form
to write a plan, letter, report etc that will need to be changed before it is in its finished form

trans.tranCn: 初步画出或（写出）的；（设计、草图、提纲或版本）正在起草中的，草拟的；以草稿形式的；草图的
trans.tranOther: a piece of writing that is not yet in its finished form
